channel.title: Can anyone help me! asap quick! please!
channel.description:
Okay well my website was working perfectly, and then i tried to make an auto vote, system, and then all of a sudden this happens everytime i try to get on my website, i even have been asking my webhost provider! but i get this error someone help!
[code]"Unable to establish connection to MySQL 1045 : Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO)"[/code] please!

item.title: Can anyone help me! asap quick! please!
item.dc:creator: @RevengePK RevengePK
item.description:
@RevengePK wrote:

Did you read the error or just see it and get scared?

1045 : Access denied for user ‘root’@‘localhost’ (using password: NO)"

Your database information is wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone help me! asap quick! please!

item.title: Can anyone help me! asap quick! please!
item.dc:creator: @TheAmmoBandit TheAmmoBandit
item.description:
@TheAmmoBandit wrote:

Have you setup a MySQL Database? If yes then check the config file to make sure it matches the settings (login etc)

Read full topic
item.source: Can anyone help me! asap quick! please!
